rcc.admin_services_explanation: These services have permissions to edit the app settings, change the look and feel, delete users, delete services, ...
rcc.app_already_reviewed: This app its facebook app has already been reviewed.
rcc.app_not_found: App '{{ app_id }} could not be found.
rcc.app_settings_explanation: These are settings which are send to all mobiles devices.
rcc.app_translations_explanation: Custom app translations that can be used as label on navigation items
rcc.app_update_already_pending: An update for this facebook app is already pending.
rcc.appengine_url_explanation: optional *.appspot.com url to speed up the proxy requests.
rcc.apple_account_email_for_itunes_connect: Apple account email for iTunes connect
rcc.apps_explanation: Configure app settings, look and feel, brandings, ...
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_embedded: Are you sure you want to delete embedded app {{ app }}?
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_contact: Are you sure you want to remove contact '{{ first_name }} {{ last_name }}'?
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_develope: Are you sure you want to remove this developer account?
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_payment_: Are you sure you want to remove payment provider {{ provider }}?
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_review_n: Are you sure you want to remove review notes '{{ name}}'?
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_x_acs: Are you sure you want to remove auto connected service {{ service }}?
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_x_admin_: Are you sure you want to remove admin service {{ service }}?
rcc.are_you_sure_you_want_to_revert_changes: Are you sure you want to revert the current changes to the app?
rcc.auto_added_services_explanation: These are services that will be auto connected to new apps, if the app id pattern matches the new app's app id.
rcc.auto_connected_services_explanation: After signing up, the user will be automatically connected to these services.
rcc.backends_explanation: Configure rogerthat servers and their settings.
rcc.birthday_message_explanation: This message will be sent to users on their birthday.
rcc.birthday_message_hint: This is the branding that will be used to send birthday wishes to the users.
rcc.brandings_explanation: These are brandings needed for build-in rogerthat features such as birthday messages.
rcc.build_already_in_progress: There is already an {{ type }} build in progress for this app.
rcc.build_missing_configurations: Please set or correct the following configurations and try again: {{ config_names }}.
rcc.build_settings_explanation: These are settings of which the changes will be applied after the app is re-build and re-submitted to the App Store / Google Play.
rcc.bulk_update_all_builds_scheduled: All builds have been successfully scheduled.
rcc.bulk_update_errors: Bulk update failed due to the following errors: {{ errors }}
rcc.cannot_remove_qr_template: Cannot remove QR template, at least one QR template is required.
rcc.confirm_delete_default_branding: Are you sure you want to delete this default branding?
rcc.confirm_delete_navigation_item: Are you sure you want to delete this navigation item?
rcc.confirm_delete_resource: Are you sure you want to delete this resource?
rcc.confirm_delete_thing: Are you sure you want to delete '{{ object }}'?
rcc.contact_linked_to_apps_error: This contact is used by the following apps and thus cannot be removed: {{ apps }}.
rcc.contacts_explanation: Configure contact information for Google Play / App Store
rcc.copyright_string: ©{{ year }} Copyright GIG Technology NV, All rights reserved
rcc.core_branding_explanation: This is the branding shown on messages sent by rogerthat system.
rcc.create_multiple_builds: Create multiple builds at a time
rcc.debug_build_information: Enabling debug mode enables logging and makes it possible to debug the app.
rcc.default_app_explanation: This is the app used to login into the webapp. Only change this if you know what you are doing.
rcc.default_brandings_explanation: These are brandings needed for build-in rogerthat features.  Apps will use these brandings if no app-specific resource is set.
rcc.default_resources_default_explanation: When default is enabled, any apps that do not have a custom resource set will use this resource.
rcc.default_resources_explanation: These are the default custom resources of the app. Apps will use these resources if no app-specific resource is set.
rcc.developer_account_linked_to_apps_error: This developer account is used by the following apps and thus cannot be removed: {{ apps }}.
rcc.developer_accounts_explanation: Configure developer accounts, used to submit apps to Google Play / App Store.
rcc.duplicate_app_id: An app with app id {{ app_id }} already exists.
rcc.duplicate_backend_id: A backend with id {{ backend_id }} already exists.
rcc.embedded_application_name_already_in_use: Name '{{ name }}' is already in use by another embedded app.
rcc.embedded_application_still_in_use: This embedded application is still in use by the following apps: {{ app_ids }}
rcc.embedded_app_types_hint: Automatically adds this embedded app to newly created apps
rcc.error_could_not_revert: Could not revert the changes. ({{ error }})
rcc.error_could_not_save_changes: Could not save the changes. ({{ error }})
rcc.facebook_settings_explanation: Enter the facebook app's credentials here. You can create a new app or get an existing app's credentials on the facebook developer website: {{ url }}.
rcc.file_too_large: This file is too large. Please upload a file smaller than {{ size }}.
rcc.friends_caption_explanation: This is an optional custom label for the 'Friends' menu item.
rcc.gig_mobile_app_center_explanation: The portal for creating, configuring and submitting your mobile apps.
rcc.go_to_first_item_instead_of_showing_list: Go to first item instead of showing list of services
rcc.google_credentials_json_explanation: This is the json file content of the service account used to upload to Google Play.
rcc.image_explanation_about_footer: This image is shown on the 'About' activity.
rcc.image_explanation_about_header: This image is shown on the 'About' activity.
rcc.image_explanation_android_icon: This icon is shown on home screen of the users' phone and in the Play Store.
rcc.image_explanation_base_image: This image will be used to generate the selected images from the list below
rcc.image_explanation_facebook_icon: This icon is used to create the facebook application
rcc.image_explanation_feature_graphic: This image is displayed at the top of the store listing page in the Play Store.
rcc.image_explanation_homescreen_header: This image is shown at the top of the navigation sidebar in the app.
rcc.image_explanation_ios_icon: This icon is shown on home screen of the users' phone and in the App Store.
rcc.image_explanation_registration_logo: This logo is shown on registration pages in the app.
rcc.image_explanation_splash_screen: This image is briefly shown when the app is starting up (only on iOS).
rcc.image_resolution_too_high: The resolution of the image is too high. Please upload images smaller than {{ resolution }}.
rcc.insufficient_app_permissions: You don't have permissions to modify the following apps: {{ apps }}
rcc.invalid_app_id_error: Invalid app id. Only a-Z, 0-9 and dashes(-) are allowed.
rcc.invalid_aspect_ratio: Invalid aspect ratio. Image must have an aspect ratio of {{ aspect_ratio }}
rcc.invalid_color: Invalid color. Color must start with #, followed with 6 hexadecimal values(0-9, a-f)
rcc.invalid_dimensions_max_x_allowed: Invalid image dimensions, image must be {{ width }} pixels wide and {{ height }} pixels high.
rcc.invalid_email_address: Please enter a valid email address
rcc.invalid_icon: Please select an icon from the suggested list
rcc.invalid_translation_key_error: Invalid translation key. Only a-Z and underscores are allowed
rcc.ios_developer_account_not_set: There is no iOS developer account set for app {{ appName }}
rcc.main_language_explanation: The language that the majority of the app its users understand.
rcc.main_service_email_explanation: Service used for the menu items configured under appearance -> sidebar.
rcc.missing_store_listing_translations: Missing store listing translations for: {{ languages }}.
rcc.mydigipass_explanation: If this is filled in services have the possibility to add a 'Mydigipass' step in message flows.
rcc.name: Name
rcc.no_build_found: This app needs to have at least one {{ build_type }} build before it is possible to review it.
rcc.no_facebook_app_configured: No facebook app has been configured for this app. Ensure you save the above settings before creating a review.
rcc.no_permission_to_change_developer_accoun: You do not have permission to change the developer account to {{ developer_account.name }} for this app.
rcc.no_permission_to_create_app_with_develop: You do not have permission to create an app with developer account {{ developer_account.name }}
rcc.no_production_apps: No apps with a release build were found!
rcc.oauth_registration_domain_explanation: Must be of format domain.tld, for example: google.com
rcc.oauth_registration_qr_explanation: This external site or service has to provide a QR code with a JWT in its data, which will be used to register the user. This URL should be opened on another device by the user.
rcc.oauth_registration_url_explanation: Users will be redirected to this URL when they try to sign up.
rcc.oauth_settings_explanation: These settings are only used when the registration type of this app is set to 'OAuth'.
rcc.one_or_more_apps_required: One or more apps are required
rcc.only_images_allowed: Only images are allowed, please choose another file.
rcc.only_zip_files_allowed: Only .zip files are allowed, please choose another file.
rcc.other_languages_explanation: Other languages on the Google Play / App Store pages of the app.
rcc.please_enter_at_least_x_characters: Please enter at least {{ characters }} characters.
rcc.please_enter_no_more_than_x_characters: Please not more than {{ characters }} characters.
rcc.please_select_at_least_x_items: Please select at least {{ items }} item(s).
rcc.publish_automatically_before_build: This will publish the pending changes automatically before starting the build. Do you still want to continue?
rcc.qr_code_template_default_explanation: When default is enabled, all new services in this app their QR codes will be based on this QR code.
rcc.qr_templates_explanation: These templates will be used for creating QR codes for services created in this app.
rcc.registration_default_explanation: Default registration, with either email address or facebook (if configured).
rcc.registration_full_oauth_explanation: Registration via an external OAuth service, But redirecting to said service is done by another website.
rcc.registration_oauth_explanation: Registration via an external OAuth service. Ensure the {{ url }} are configured properly.
rcc.release_build_information: A release build will be submitted to the AppStore or Play store automatically.
rcc.request_facebook_review_explanation: This will request a review for the facebook app. This should only be done once.
rcc.resources_explanation: These are custom resources of the app, such as the chat background image.
rcc.review_already_in_progress: The review for this app is currently in progress.
rcc.review_notes_explanation: Configure review notes for Apple review
rcc.review_notes_linked_to_apps_error: These review notes are used by the following apps and thus cannot be removed: {{ apps }}.
rcc.save_changes_to_app_message: Enter a comment related to the changes you made to this app
rcc.secure_app_explanation: Requires the user to enter a pin code before using the app. Requires Android 6.0 or above.
rcc.server_unavailable: The server is currently not available or its address is misconfigured.
rcc.service_identity_not_found: Service identity '{{ service_identity }}' does not exist.
rcc.sidebar_item_text_hint: Custom text must be one of the translations defined in Build settings -> App translations
rcc.submit_for_review_information: When enabled, the app will be submitted to review by Apple. Else the build will be available via Testflight.
rcc.this_is_what_users_see_when_creating_an_: This is what the users will see when creating or editing an app
rcc.this_value_must_be_greater_than: This value must be greater than {{ value }}.
rcc.this_value_must_be_lower_than: This value must be lower than {{ value }}.
rcc.title: Title
rcc.translations_add_language_explanation: To add translations for other languages, add them at
rcc.unknown_error_occurred: An unknown error has occured. Please try again later or contact the administrators if it keeps happening.
rcc.update_facebook_explanation: This will update the info about the app on facebook (app name, description, languages, ...)
rcc.upload_new_file_with_dimensions: Upload a new {{ format }} image ({{ width }}px x {{ height }}px)
rcc.url_regexes_explanation: This embedded app will be opened when scanning a QR code that matches any of these regexes
rcc.user_needs_to_accept_invite: This user needs to accept this invitation on {{ url }} in order to have this permission.
rcc.wifi_only_downloads: Only download flow attachments over wifi
rcc.you_do_not_have_permission_to_view_this_: You do not have permission to view or update this information
